price: Ndipo akamwomba Mola wake Mlezi: Hakika watu hawa ni wakosefu.
arabic: فَدَعَا رَبَّهُۥٓ أَنَّ هَٰٓؤُلَآءِ قَوۡمٞ مُّجۡرِمُونَ
footnotes: Musa akamwambia Mola wake Mlezi kwa kumshitakia watu wake alipo kata tamaa nao kuwa hawaamini: Hakika watu hawa shauri yao imekwisha fika ukomo katika ukafiri; basi Wewe wafanyie wanalo stahiki.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: fadaʿā rabbahu anna hāulāi qawmun muj'rimūna
